title: Calpis logo Sans Serif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414192607im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DISPLAY-1-SIGN_5104.jpg)

Hello Guys I need you to help me find this font.

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DISPLAY-1-SIGN.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414192607/http:/typophile.com/files/DISPLAY-1-SIGN.jpg) | 43.56 KB |
author: gabcc54

comments.content:
I looked at various fonts, and can not find one font with all letterforms. [Magistral Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414192607/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/magistral/?refby=bowfin) gets close on all but the A and P. [FF Clan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414192607/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-clan-ot/?refby=bowfin) was pretty good for those two letters, but not the C and L.

Most likely custom, I think. Does anyone know if the ® signifies the design of the logo (lettering), or just the name? I guess I have assumed it meant the design (implying custom lettering).

- Mike Yanega
